name: core_simd::swizzle::Swizzle::swizzle_mask

core_simd::masks::Mask::<T, N>::to_int.doc:
Converts the mask to a vector of integers, where 0 represents `false` and -1
 represents `true`.

core_simd::swizzle::Swizzle::swizzle.doc:
Creates a new vector from the elements of `vector`.

 Lane `i` of the output is `vector[Self::INDEX[i]]`.

core_simd::masks::Mask::<T, N>::from_int.doc:
Converts a vector of integers to a mask, where 0 represents `false` and -1
 represents `true`.

 # Safety
 All elements must be either 0 or -1.

doc:
Creates a new mask from the elements of `mask`.

 Element `i` of the output is `mask[Self::INDEX[i]]`.
